0.text: Innate: Tristana's basic attacks,  Explosive Charge and  Buster Shot gain  0 − 136 (based on level) bonus range, for a total of 525 − 661 (based on level).

0.text: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
0.html: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Tristana  jumps to the target location. Upon landing, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them by 60% for a duration.
0.html: Active: Tristana jumps to the target location. Upon landing, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 60% for a duration.
markedPassages: jumps
slows

1.text: Scoring an enemy  champion  takedown or detonating  Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on a  champion will reset Rocket Jump's  cooldown.
1.html: Scoring an enemy champion takedown or detonating Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on a champion will reset Rocket Jump's  cooldown.

takedown
Explosive Charge
champion
cooldown

2.text: Tristana can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Rocket Jump will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Tristana can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Rocket Jump will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Tristana can cast any of her abilities during the dash. Rocket Jump will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: Tristana's basic attacks are empowered to trigger an explosion when they kill the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Passive: Tristana's basic attacks are empowered to trigger an explosion when they kill the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Active: Tristana tosses an explosive charge at the target enemy that attaches to them for 4 seconds. The charge then detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Explosive Charge can target and damage  turrets, and explodes in a larger radius on a turret.
1.html: Active: Tristana tosses an explosive charge at the target enemy that attaches to them for 4 seconds. The charge then detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Explosive Charge can target and damage turrets, and explodes in a larger radius on a turret.
markedPassages: turrets

2.text: Tristana's basic attacks  on-hit and abilities against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.The charge's total damage is additionally increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance).
2.html:
Tristana's basic attacks on-hit and abilities against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
The charge's total damage is additionally increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance).
markedPassages: on-hit
0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance)

3.text: If  Buster Shot is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the  knock back or the 4 seconds expire.
3.html: If Buster Shot is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the knock back or the 4 seconds expire.
markedPassages: Buster Shot
knock back
possibleConcerningAbilities: If  Buster Shot is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the  knock back or the 4 seconds expire.

4.text: Tristana will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.
4.html: Tristana will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Tristana will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.

0.text: Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that deals magic damage. They and surrounding enemies are also  knocked back and  stunned for up-to 0.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining  bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
Active: Tristana  jumps to the target location. Upon landing, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them by 60% for a duration.
Active: Tristana  jumps to the target location. Upon landing, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them by 60% for a duration.
Passive: Tristana's basic attacks are empowered to trigger an explosion when they kill the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Tristana tosses an explosive charge at the target enemy that attaches to them for 4 seconds. The charge then detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Explosive Charge can target and damage  turrets, and explodes in a larger radius on a turret.

Tristana's basic attacks  on-hit and abilities against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.The charge's total damage is additionally increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance).

Tristana's basic attacks  on-hit and abilities against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.The charge's total damage is additionally increased by 0% − 33.3% (based on critical strike chance).

Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that deals magic damage. They and surrounding enemies are also  knocked back and  stunned for up-to 0.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed.

Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that deals magic damage. They and surrounding enemies are also  knocked back and  stunned for up-to 0.75 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
